meanings.definition: a slang term for wavy hair
meanings.sent1: Her long waveys flowed down her back.
meanings.sent2: I love how her waveys bounce when she walks.
meanings.sent3: The wind made her waveys dance in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her waveys were like golden ribbons framing her face.
meanings.sent5: The sun highlighted the natural beauty of her waveys.

meanings.definition: a type of potato chip with a wavy shape
meanings.sent1: I grabbed a handful of waveys from the bag.
meanings.sent2: The party snacks included waveys and pretzels.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't resist the crunch of the waveys.
meanings.sent4: The waveys in the bowl looked like mini ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The salty flavor of the waveys was irresistible.

meanings.definition: a term used to describe a pattern of waves in the ocean
meanings.sent1: The surfers rode the big waveys all day.
meanings.sent2: The storm created massive waveys along the coast.
meanings.sent3: The dolphins played in the gentle waveys near the shore.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight shimmered on the dark waveys of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the crashing waveys was soothing.
